function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation rates due to building modifications","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality and increased risk of respiratory diseases","Mitigation":"Consulting building physics principles and involving relevant built environment professionals in building modifications","Technologies":"Building physics analysis software for optimal ventilation design","People":"Building owners, occupants, design professionals","Owner":"Building owners, design professionals"},{"Description":"Lack of synergy in building envelop modifications","Impact":"Compromised factors that define a healthy building-indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Developing a knowledge management framework for information sharing across different disciplines","Technologies":"Knowledge management software for integrated decision support","People":"Built environment professionals, design professionals","Owner":"Built environment professionals"},{"Description":"Unfavorable conditions for humans due to changes in building openings","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory diseases and compromised thermal comfort","Mitigation":"Ensuring that building modifications align with passive heating and cooling strategies","Technologies":"Passive heating and cooling design software","People":"Building occupants, design professionals","Owner":"Building owners, design professionals"}]}
